text: Ra Anumzamofo nonte Jerusalemi e'za, Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe' Anumzamo'ma Ozmahe Zamagatere'nea zanku eme antahimiza musenkase hihogu, maka Israeli vahetegane, Juda vahetegama kema erino vuno enoma hu vahera Hezekaia'a huzmantege'za nevazageno, ana zanke huno Efraemi nagategane Manase nagateganena avona kretregeno vu'ne.
